=== Notes ===
Test in progress.

=== Color Management ===

Laptop displays are generally poor, and the HP Compaq 6730s is no exception to that. Despite being a poor display, it can be color managed. I measured the display with a spectrophotometer and generated a color profile using ArgyllCMS. You can download the ICCv2 compliant color profile as <nowiki>[[attachment:hp_compaq_6730s.icc]]</nowiki>. To use the profile you need to install <nowiki>[[http://packages.ubuntu.com/lucid/gnome-color-manager|GNOME Color Manager]]</nowiki>, after which you can just double click the .icc file to install it, using the Color Profiles applet on the System/Preferences menu you can enable the color profile for your display. The profile should give optimal accuracy with the laptop display at 100% brightness. Your mileage may vary, since not every display is manufactured identically, and displays change with age.
